text: Yasnaya Polyana () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Toykinskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 7 as of 2010.ВПН-2010. Численность и размещение населения Пермского края There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 2.5 km east from Toykino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Yasnaya Polyana, Perm Krai
